phrases: We have a transfer student joining us today.
Go ahead and introduce yourself.
I am Asagiri Minori.
Asagiri Minori
Nice to meet you.
Mob Psycho
What?
Your dad runs a company, Asagiri-san?
That is awesome!
Want To come over sometime?
Heck yeah!
Let us have a welcoming party.
All right.
Whoever's going, write your name down.
I am definitely writing my name down!
No need to bother asking Kageyama.
Yeah.
What is his deal?
The token punching bag?
Who knows?
I have never really thought about him.
He is barely noticeable.
Hope
Oh, I see...
The people here are accurate representations of actual people from the real world.
So what you are experiencing is a parallel world that could have easily come to pass
had your circumstances been slightly different.
And I will observe how you fare in this environment without your powers.
Do not give me that I do not know crap!
Are my lessons that boring?
You can stay standing.
All that was left in the problem was addition.
Talk about lame.
He is too stupid.
Hey, stop that...
He is completely frozen.
You had plenty of relationships in real life,
and you were fortunate enough to be surrounded by good people.
Situations like that are extremely rare.
You do not have a phone or wallet on you, and no parents at home?
Do not give me that shit!
How about I give you a nose job?!
Please... let me go...
What?
You want to go?
Bring it!
Get'i am, Sugimoto!
Come on!
Come on!
Where the hell are you looking?!
Your extremely talented brother is no more than a stranger here.
It looks like you refrain from using your powers in your personal life.
I am guessing you are trying to become a better person
by focusing on developing your social skills rather than your powers,
but only the fortunate in life would even have that idea.
It shows how lightly you take the real world.
If only I were stronger...
Nature
Dream
Friendship
Darkness
Nature
Here, have some milk!
Wait, did not you mention you loved milk?
Is not this what you meant?
Ew, you reek of milk.
One of you better mop that up.
I am sure that this must seem inexplicable to you,
but she is bullying you in order to secure her position in society,
and it is something she is done routinely.
If you do not become stronger, you will be used, exploited,
and forever a stepping stone for others.
Not looking good.
Pretty sure Shigeo lost.
But it has not even been thirty minutes yet.
That is way too long!
He should have been done in a minute.
If this keeps up, his sense of self will fall apart.
He is going to die!
Mob is someone who can solve things on his own.
He actually has strength, unlike me.
Quit being naIve.
The next time this guy wakes up, we are all finished.
Anxiety, fear, rage...
All the negative emotions are collectively welling up within you.
That is only natural after living in this world for six months without your powers.
You must not misuse your powers.
Calpas
Saga Building
I could see spirits ever since I was born.
I even had the power to exorcise them.
At first, I used my powers for good,
by giving advice and solving various problems.
The Psychic of the Century Mogami Keiji-san
But my mother developed a mysterious illness,
and the fees for her treatment were obscene.
Eventually, I started taking underground jobs to kill people for money.
I even gave up sleep to earn as much as I could.
But my mother still died.
The because of her illness remained unclear to the end.
There was nothing anyone could do.
But then, I found out...
After her death, my mother became an evil spirit and said...
It is all your fault!
My own actions brought forth evil around me,
and that is what ended up plaguing her.
I should have doubted my way of life, how I was being used by others.
Suicide by Hanging
Early yesterday, Mogami Keiji-san, the famous psychic, was discovered dead.
News
I became an evil spirit and decided to use my powers for myself this time.
According to the MPD, the because of death was suicide.
I was going to change the world.
I began to punish those who brought misfortune to others.
If I dwelt within that girl,
I knew that I could punish these self-proclaimed psychics as well.
This is how I chose to use my powers.
You are allowed to use your powers for yourself...
No, you should be using your powers for yourself.
You understand that now, do not you?
Here you go.
Well, that is a crappy thing to do.
Do not you know that feeding strays is a public disservice?
What are you going to do about that cat?
N-Nothing...
Really?
That poor thing.
In that case, the cat's probably better off dying.
I will go take it to a shelter.
Do not...
I will take it in.
I will take care of it!
Quit scaring Asagiri-san, you punk!
The door broke open!
But it was sealed so tightly...
It worked out because he is not concentrating as much of his power out here.
Now we can get out.
Call an ambulance!
Carry out the wounded!
You are not going to run away?
Shigeo's done for.
Why are you staying behind?
Because I trust in him.
In this situation?
Are you really this stupid?
Yup, I am.
This is probably the first time someone is placed so much trust in you too, right?
Mob trusts us... because he is stupid.
I have still got plenty of use for him,
and considering that, running away is the last thing I want to do.
Well, I cannot bring out Shigeo's latent powers on my own.
In that case, it would be more effective to manipulate him from the shadows.
I changed my mind.
I will stay behind as well.
Good.
Let us wait this out.
Nope.
Waiting's not going to bring Shigeo back.
I guess I will have to take care of this myself.
Are you frustrated?
Enraged?
Do you hate them?
Do you despise them?
They are a cancer to society.
Stop letting them use you.
You will be reborn as my sympathizer.
I shall give you strength...
Make your negative emotions explode and use them against the world!
I am having a hard time getting in...
Shigeo actually got through this shield?
Damn it!
Hey, I can feel my spiritual power spiking.
This should work!
Did it work?
You owe me one.
Now that I have helped you, you would better win this.
Wh-What is with you?
I-I can have Papa's bodyguards beat the crap out of you anytime I want!
So what?
Apologize.
Yes...
Make her disappear!
Apologize.
I-I am sorry...
If you ever bother me again...
Die, you freak!
You should just die.
What did I ever do to you people?
I cannot think of a single thing...
But it does not matter.
None of this matters.
It is complete.
You finally changed.
You were a lot like me,
and that is why I did not want you to travel the same path I did.
Hey.
The snot's talking?!
No trespassing Seasoning Realty
Man, you are pretty far gone, are not you?
Hey, do you know who I am?
What the heck is this creature?
Actually, before that...
There he is.
Quit lurking.
Damn you for actually falling for these illusions.
Fine.
I will have to use all the spiritual power I have stocked up, but...
Time for some shock therapy!
Remember, Shigeo.
Reigen and I are waiting for you outside!
Rei... gen?
Who is that?
Oh, hey, Mob.
Sorry, but could you hurry to the office?
A huge job just came in.
Your master needs your help, so you better hurry it up.
Mas... ter?
Stop using your powers for dumb things in this dumb world.
Do not you want to be a big brother your little brother can look up to?
My little brother?
Look up to me?
I accidentally wore the wrong shoes.
These are Ritsu's.
Do not let Mogami influence you like that.
You even managed to stick to your values when you fought Hanazawa!
That is right...
I am not supposed to use these powers against other people.
Not to mention, why are you losing so easily to commoners?
You bring shame to the Body Improvement Club!
Where did all those muscles you built up go?
I do not know how much time you have spent in this dump,
but this is not like you.
Do you want your beloved Tsubomi-chan to hate you?
Well done.
Nii-san.
Heya.
Body improvement!
Fight on!
Okay, that is going way too far...
I remember.
Do you remember me, too?
I am your partner!
No, not really...
Seriously?
I am kidding.
Thanks,
Dimple.
So what if your memories came back?
The six months you have spent here are forever etched into your heart.
I know you were hearing my voice subconsciously.
Mogami...
Just like you said, the world can be a cruel and messed-up place.
You helped me see it in a new light.
Huh?
Do not tell me you...
I am truly blessed.
I need to be more thankful to everyone around me
once I get back to the real world.
So that is how it is going to be?
And here I thought I would found a sympathizer.
How disappointing.
One other thing.
People can change through their interactions with others.
I was able to change because of everyone.
I was able to become a little stronger than if I had been alone.
If I am able to change, then everyone else should be able to as well.
That means no one is worthless.
Do not say another word...
Or you will have hell to pay.
The Shigeo you fabricated might succumb to you, but I will not.
I am not going to run.
I still have that awful Asagiri-san to save.
Mob Psycho
Mob Psycho
A spiritual mutation?
Guess we are going to have to fight!
You up for this, Shigeo?
Looks like there is nothing to worry about.
Here come more of them!
Every inhabitant of this world is...
Shigeo!
That is...
I am going to defeat this evil spirit and go back to reality.
And what good would that do?
The life you lead will not change, and nor will society's absurdities.
There will be plenty of things to annoy and trouble you.
The outside world is... scary?
Life is frustrating, devoid of meaning, and so, so painful.
I can hear them...
The voices of the dead are speaking to me.
So many screams...
They died feeling like this?
Is this how they felt when they were alive?
It is such a cruel world...
Am I really going to be able to...
That voice!
Help me...
Oh...
That is right.
I came here to save someone.
I always thought these powers were of no use to anybody,
but I will use them to save people!
It does not matter what you do.
You cannot defeat me!
Shigeo... you did it.
Well, I will be damned.
You are not the same boy from earlier.
Who are you?
You finally get how freaky he is?
This is Kageyama Shigeo's true form that he reveals when he is pissed
Dimple.
It is dangerous, so leave this to me and stay back.
Actually, yeah, who are you?
Mogami had overlooked something that lay dormant within Mob.
A person's heart is made up of two sides of the same coin.
Just as happiness shines in the shadows of sorrow,
only in the darkest depths of fear
does courage truly shine.
The powerful blast from Mob's positive emotions at 100
annihilated the great evil spirit, Mogami.
Or at least, that is how it looked.
Now that they have lost me, their vessel,
all of the evil spirits that I would taken in and controlled will all be freed at once.
Not even I can stop them anymore.
Shigeo!
Dimple, go ahead and head back!
I will be fine!
Y-You sure about that?!
I am going to save Asagiri-san.
I am going to completely exorcise them before I leave.
I will be back, I promise.
Do not worry.
You trying to eat me, too?
Damn it.
Catch me if you can, you bastards!
Bring it!
I will be waiting for you on the other side!
In this world,
everything I can see is a spirit.
I have to exorcise them all.
No matter how much you struggle,
your path will lead you to the same place mine did...
To ruin.
I am going to save her... I...
I cannot go out like this!
I see.
Your vessel has been shattered,
and that is what is inside?
I actually thought you might have died.
That took you ages.
Yes, a very long time...
Master, how is Asagiri-san?
Well, if you are awake...
He is still
You have made your choice.
I will keep watching from afar to see if you made the right one.
You are not going anywhere, my pet.
That was an unexpected trophy.
Thank you.
Is not that...
I did not even realize he was here.
I will make sure I take really good care of him.
Farewell.
Perhaps we will see each other again.
Kageyama-kun?
Yeah.
What?
You guys know each other?
Nah, she probably just remembers what happened over there.
Are you really always like that?
Yeah...
I am.
I am sorry.
I am really... really sorry...
I am so sorry!
I am so sorry!
It is okay.
I understand.
Understand what?
That people can change.
Mogami-san and Asagiri-san taught me that.
The people around me changed me as well.
Now I know that I might be able to change others too,
so I am glad we were able to meet.
Thank you...
So you are saying the one who saved you is a boy in your grade?
Yeah, why?
There was not a middle school student among the people I hired.
Huh?
He was not even asked to be there,
but he managed to exorcise an evil spirit that no one else could
and left without saying a word.
That is so cool.
I hope I can see him again.
I did a bit of research, and this caught my eye.
Psycho Helmet Religion
Huh?
Is not that...
Our religious organization is not going to survive on donations alone.
It is going to be impossible to build a headquarters.
Not to mention our beloved founder is still nowhere to be found.
Ow.
Thank you for your continued business with us.
hhThere has been a deposit of 500,000,000 JPY to your account.
hhhThank you hhhhCurrent available balance: 500,010,180 JPY
Master, why are not you going to claim your reward?
Look how many people got hurt.
I would not exactly call that a success.
You should never accept money you feel you have not earned.
If you do, you will start to always take the easy way out.
You just do not want to be held responsible.
That is not it, you moron!
Anyway, no good ever comes out of drowning in wealth or power.
Mogami let his own powers swallow him up, too.
You know...
You are better off working part-time for me than becoming famous or powerful.
Oh, give me a friggin' break...
Hey, quit clowning around with your classmates, Mob!
We are busy here.
They are just using you!
Jeez.
You never learn, do you?
Poor, Lonely, Whitey.
Poor, Lonely, Whitey
The DVDs?
That is an excellent decision!
